Question: This person was one of the few actors who successfully made the transition from 1950s cinema to that of the 1960s and 1970s.
Hints: In 2003, this person acted in a remake of Our Town, this time in the role of the stage manager.
In 2011 this person's estate gifted land to Westport to be managed by the Aspetuck Land Trust.
He was also a partner in the Atlantic Championship team this person Wachs Racing.
